text: Karin Larissa Herrera Aguilar (born 25 July 1968) is a Guatemalan biologist, professor, sociologist, and politician who is currently serving as the 18th Vice President of Guatemala since 2024. She is a member of the political party Semilla. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1968 births Category:Vice presidents Category:Guatemalan politicians Category:Guatemalan writers Category:Academics Category:Biologists Category:Sociologists Category:People from Guatemala City
title: Karin Herrera
